Игра хорошая, но естьнемного минусов:
1. Много читеров если без прайма
2. Долгий поиск игры. Что? В кс:го так мало людей играют? Valve?
Плюсы:
1. Донат ничего не решает
хуета полная но приятная в области анала.

Not hitting anything? Always wanted to learn Russian? Counter Blocks: Roblox Offensive looks too difficult? Then this game is perfect for you! Enjoy feeling like a true American as you rush to B while shooting everything that crosses your path. Have some fun hours with your friends who are definitely going to leave you after the first round is lost. Don't worry about hackers, there is probably one in your team too, so everything is balanced!
Very unenjoyable so far, ill update later if the situation changes
